title: Quiz 4 - Seating Arrangement
instruction:
Directions (Q. 21 – 25): Read the following information carefully and answer the questions below:

Ten persons are sitting in two rows containing five persons each. In row 1 – A, B, C, D and E are sitting and all of them facing south. In row 2 – P, Q, R, S and T are sitting and all of them are facing north. In the given seating arrangement each member sitting in a row faces another member of the other row. Moreover, each of them belongs to a different country – Australia, Brazil, Bulgaria, Belgium, Japan, India, Romania, Indonesia, Iran and Russia, but not necessarily in the same order.

There are only two persons sitting between the Australia, who sits at an extreme end, and E. P, who sits in the middle of the row, is not an immediate neighbour of Q, who is not a Russian.

T is sitting at an extreme end. E, a Japanese, sits on the immediate right of the person from Brazil and faces the immediate neighbour of Q.

B is not sitting at the extreme left end. P is not from Iran. There is only one person sitting between C and D, who is from Australia. S is an Indian and is an immediate neighbour of the Russian and doesn't face the person from Bulgaria.

R, who is from Belgium, is an immediate neighbour of the person from Iran who is facing an immediate neighbour of the Japanese. There are two persons between the Romanian and the Bulgarian. B is not from Romania. T is not from Indonesia.

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are not true?
options: R is the immediate neighbour of U and V.
W faces the one who sits on the immediate right of Q.
Q sits second to the right of the one who studies Hindi.
N faces the one who studies Chemistry.
All are true.

quiz.text: Who among the following sits second to the right of T?
options: The one who faces the one who studies Biology
The one who studies Botany.
The one who sits second to the left of the one who studies Geography.
The one who faces O, who studies Maths.
None of these.

quiz.text: If Zoology is related to U and Chemistry is related to M, following the same pattern Math is related to which of the following?
options: The one who sits on the immediate left of U.
The one who faces M.
The one who sits third to the right of V.
The one who faces south
None of these.

quiz.text: Which of the following combinations of persons sit at the extreme ends of the row?
options: O, P, U, S
W, S, Q, O
W, P, S, O
L, M, W, P
O, S, T, M

quiz.text: Four of the following five are alike in a certain way and so form a group. Which is the one that does not belong to that group?
options: O – Chemistry
N – Botany
M – Civics
L – English
R – Sanskrit

quiz.text: How many persons are there between T and T's daughter?
options: One
None
Three
Two
None of these

quiz.text: Who among the following is son of V?
options: W
Z
U
S
None of these

quiz.text: Who among the following is mother-in-law of V?
options: Y
X
U
Can't be determined
None of these

quiz.text: How many persons are there between T's sister and T's son?
options: Two
One
Three
None
None of these

quiz.text: Who among the following is second to the right of T's mother?
options: T's brother
T's father
T's daughter
T's son
None of these

quiz.text: Who among the following speaks English?
options: R
W
S
V
None of these

quiz.text: How many persons are there between those who speak Punjabi and Telugu respectively?
options: None
One
Three
Four
None of these

quiz.text: Who among the following is sitting third to the left of the one who speaks Tamil?
options: The one who speaks  Punjabi
The one who speaks English
The one who speaks Bengali
The one who speaks Telugu
None of these

quiz.text: The one who sits second to the right of W speaks which of the following languages?
options: Marathi
Bengali
Telugu
Hindi
Odia

quiz.text: Who among the following sits opposite the one who speaks Odia?
options: P
The one who speaks Bengali
The one who speaks English
V
None of these

quiz.text: Who sits exactly between S and T?
options: R
Q
P
Can't be determined
None of these

quiz.text: How many persons in the given arrangement face south?
options: Two
Three
Four
Five
None of these

quiz.text: Who sits third to the right of P?
options: S
O
N
Q
T

quiz.text: Four of the following five are alike in a certain way and so form a group. Which is the one that does not belong to that group?
options: Q, N
S, T
M, O
P, R
S,Q

quiz.text: Who among the following sit at the extreme ends of the line?
options: M, N
N,O
P, M
R, P
None of these

quiz.text: A belongs to which of the following countries?
options: Indonesia
Romania
Bulgaria
None of these
Can't be determined

quiz.text: Who is from Indonesia?
options: R
B
T
P
Can't be determined

quiz.text: The Australian is related to the Romanian in a certain way based on their seating positions. Then the Russian is related to who among the following the same sitting pattern?
options: Indonesia
Iran
Brazil
India
Belgium

quiz.text: Four of the following five are alike in a certain way based on their seating positions and so form a group. Which of the following is different from the group?
options: Japan
Romania
Russia
Belgium
India

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are definitely false?
options: B is from Bulgaria.
There are two persons sitting between the Indian and the person from Iran.
The Brazilian faces the person from Indonesia.
The person who is from Iran sits opposite the Australian.
None of these
